         </li>

     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|topStories|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/">

     </a>
     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|sectionGroup2|title|index 1" href="https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/uk-news/oonagh-wilkinson-lake-district-raffle-20076176">

       </span>
      </a>
     </div>
     <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/uk-news/oonagh-wilkinson-lake-district-raffle-20076176">
      Mum Samantha Wilkinson said she will donate 40,000 of the sale to charity after her daughter was diagnosed with a rare form of cancer
     </a>

      </a>

           </a>
           <div>
            <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 4" href="https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/">
             Greater Manchester News
            </a>
            <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/warning-fraudsters-selling-fake-negative-20225526">
             Anyone found in possession of fake covid certification may be declined travel, arrested or fined, or banned from the airline for all future travel.

  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>
